# itemCount

**Instance Property**

The total number of items, across all sections, in the list.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var itemCount: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

This value never exceeds [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPListTemplate/maximumItemCount]. If you initialize a list where the total number of items, across all sections, is greater than [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPListTemplate/maximumItemCount], CarPlay only displays items up to this limit and discards the rest.

## Getting Supplementary Information

- **maximumItemCount**: The maximum number of items, across all sections, that the template can display.
- **indexPath(for:)**: Returns the index path for the specified item.
- **title**: The title that the navigation bar displays when the template is visible.
